Class DataSender

    • java.lang.Thread

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class DataSender
extends AbstractTransmission
    Class to send a InputStream to a remote DataReceiver.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DataSender

        public DataSender(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
          long inputStreamLength,
          java.lang.String inputName,
          EncryptionType encryptionType,
          byte[] encryptionKey,
          int receiverPort,
          java.net.InetAddress receiverAddress)
        Creates a new DataSender instance.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream to send
        inputStreamLength - the length of inputStream or -1 if the stream is endless
        inputName - the name of the resource represented by inputStream, e.g. the filename
        encryptionType - the EncryptionType that will be used
        encryptionKey - the encryption key that will be used
        receiverPort - the port on which the receiver is waiting
        receiverAddress - the InetAddress of the receiver

      • DataSender

        public DataSender(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
          long inputStreamLength,
          java.lang.String inputName,
          EncryptionType encryptionType,
          byte[] encryptionKey,
          int receiverPort,
          java.net.InetAddress receiverAddress,
          AbstractTransmissionAdapter adapter)
        Creates a new DataSender instance.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream to send
        inputStreamLength - the length of inputStream or -1 if the stream is endless
        inputName - the name of the resource represented by inputStream, e.g. the filename
        encryptionType - the EncryptionType that will be used
        encryptionKey - the encryption key that will be used
        receiverPort - the port on which the receiver is waiting
        receiverAddress - the InetAddress of the receiver
        adapter - the AbstractTransmissionAdapter to be notified about progress updates

      • DataSender

        public DataSender(java.io.InputStream inputStream,
          long inputStreamLength,
          java.lang.String inputName,
          EncryptionType encryptionType,
          byte[] encryptionKey,
          int receiverPort,
          java.net.InetAddress receiverAddress,
          AbstractTransmissionAdapter adapter,
          java.lang.String senderClientId)
        Creates a new DataSender instance.
        Parameters:
        inputStream - the InputStream to send
        inputStreamLength - the length of inputStream or -1 if the stream is endless
        inputName - the name of the resource represented by inputStream, e.g. the filename
        encryptionType - the EncryptionType that will be used
        encryptionKey - the encryption key that will be used
        receiverPort - the port on which the receiver is waiting
        receiverAddress - the InetAddress of the receiver
        adapter - the AbstractTransmissionAdapter to be notified about progress updates
        senderClientId - this device's client id to send to the receiver to identify this device

    • Method Detail

      • transmit

        public void transmit()
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Description copied from class: AbstractTransmission
        Transmits the data. This method should call AbstractTransmission.increaseTransmittedLength(long) in fixed periods to allow precise speed and progress measurements.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • forceCloseTransmissionStream

        public void forceCloseTransmissionStream()
                                  throws java.io.IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractTransmission
        Closes all closable resources used by this AbstractTransmission. Is calles after a transmission is successfully done or in case of an error.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
